TextLibrary.Text: The weapon is on Quesada Tau
The Quesadans don't like you enough to tell you anything about the weapon
Negotiate for the Weapon on Quesadan Tau
Destroy the Vagabond near Quesada Tau
Destroy the Vagabond near Quesada Base
Report your success to Quesada Prime
Report your success to Quesada Prime
The Quesadans give you the Weapon with their blessing
